Phrase: After proceeding through the tunnel filled with Phantom Mist, we emerged into an open area. Unlike the passage where there were iron bars, there are very few lights illuminating these ruins.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: We've come out into a lot of open space. I wonder if the tunnels are clustered here...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's a big place, yet there are very few lights.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: I'm turning on the lights now.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: There are a lot of minecarts. The cart that hit us must have left from here.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: This is a steel terminal. If that's the case, the power source must be nearby.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But it's eerily quiet. No Phantom Mist, no Mist Monsters.
Perhaps the power supply range of this site is divided into compartments. The fact that several tunnels converge at this location suggests that not all of the minecarts in this terminal are powered.
If our enemy were to activate all the minecarts and other resources that are parked here, it would use a lot of energy.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Meaning, this is the last line of defence?

Name: Amiens
Phrase: It's now or never if we want to move on. If the master of the ruins controls this terminal, there will be a tremendous number of Mist Monsters attacking us.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: It's not just the monsters we need to be wary of. The traps that block intruders must also be more powerful.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: How can we continue onwards then? There seem to be a lot of tunnels up there, but that's probably the way to the surface. I feel like we're going back to the level where we started.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Everyone, there's another grate over here! Maybe we can get to the lower levels from here.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I see a lift at the back. If we break in through yet another entrance somewhere else, maybe we can all get on the lift?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Just to add, it was Yoshino who found it this time too.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Good job Yoshino, next time I'll groom your ears.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Eheheh... will make you a little brat who can't live without Yoshino.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Come now Yoshino, stop fooling around, we'll both go again. There's a reasonably sized drainage outlet right here and...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooh, reached for it and it reached back.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Ahaha, so you opened it from the outside...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Y-Yn-Ygh-You should have said that earlier if you can open it this easily!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Yoshino, do you think you can activate this lift?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's a very simple mechanism. The wedge goes clack-clack while the lever is pulled down.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Right then, everybody, get on the lift.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Can we all get on this lift?

Name: Putra
Phrase: So there are nine of us in all. I think we'll just barely make it if we squeezy-peazy in, Vivienne, pack a bit more that way.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Gah!? Wait! Don't push me out of the way!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: The holy angel shalt fall to purgatory!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Aduh!

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Rouen, it's not safe to ride like that!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Proceeding on to the last final phase. The master of these ruins is approaching us...

Name: Putra
Phrase: No, it's just you approaching it...

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Désolé. Rouen does this when closing in on masters of other ruins. I don't know how she works, but she's rather accurate. Perhaps the thing causing the Phantom Mist is close by.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Heeh, so you're saying she has a good sense then.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Look, all that's left is Yoshino and Yakutsk. Get in. You two can fit in the gap there, can't you? It's kind of, you know, tiny.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...Yakutsk, you can go on first.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You go first. I don't want you to get your tail or ears stuck inside it.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, that's fine. Anyway, Yakutsk, you go on first.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It doesn't matter which one of us rides first, we won't be overweight. Even if we are, the chain wouldn't break...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Wait a minute...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yoshino, did you just told us how this lift works?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The lever makes the wedge go clack-clack, and Yoshino has to do that. So Yakutsk, you get on the lift.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: No, no. You just said 'the wedge goes clack-clacks while the lever is being lowered'.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Meaning this lift can only be lowered to the bottom if someone is outside operating it, right?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Un, seems like it. So someone has to stay here.

Name: Putra
Phrase: But that means it would be too dangerous for the people who stayed behind!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: So let's split the team in two. Miss Yakutsk and I will stay here with Miss Yoshino.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Amiens, if you'll pardon me for a moment. I'm getting off the lift now...
Just as Queensway is about to push Amiens' body off the lift--
--A trap was triggered, splitting our unit in the worst possible way.
Power Room Trap Activated. Terminal Will Now Be Shut Down.
All Units, Rush To The Terminal. Repeat. Rush To The Terminal.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The lift doors have closed! The alarm too!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Stop messing around, Miss Yoshino! Please open it!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, not Yoshino doing this, Yoshino didn't do anything.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: The terminal minecarts are on the move!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What!? Then the Mist is also...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: This is bad! We can't fight if we're trapped inside the lift!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: There's no choice but to lower the lift. While Yoshino operates the lever, Yakutsk will have to buy everyone else some time.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I guess that's the only way. It's going to be trouble after we get everyone down...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You can't. You wouldn't have anywhere to run, Yakutsk. Yoshino, can't you somehow get these bars up?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That would be difficult. There's no mechanism, and also, sensed a very powerful magic.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: This can't be...

Name: Rouen
Phrase: In the graveyard of steel, the minecarts came back to life. It was a very evil force that brought them back to life. It is too dangerous to stay. Find a way out quickly.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Graveyard... Way out...

Name: Karl
Phrase: The most terrifying part of Ouvrage Schoenenbourg is the Minecart Graveyard, if you get trapped there, look for the steel floorboards. You should be able to get out through the vents to the fortress ammunition store.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: If this is the Minecart Graveyard, there is a way out...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yakutsk?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: See! Remember what Karl told us!? If you get trapped in the Minecart Graveyard, look for the steel floorboards!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh-! That's what he said! He said he'd show us the way out!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Conductor, Yoshino and I will be fine. We know the way down. So please go ahead! If you don't, we'll all die!
Can I trust your words? If you're lying, I'll never forgive you, got it?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: If I wanna lie, I'll tell you a more decent lie. It's impossible for all of us here to get out, but I'm sure it's possible if it's just Yoshino and I!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Sou sou, because Yoshino and friends are tiny.
Got it, we'll wait downstairs first. Keep your safety as top priority. Find a way out and meet up with us at the deepest part of the ruins.
All members of the Special Steel Squad, we will destroy the thing that controls this fortress.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yoshino, let it down!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Everybody, hold on tight. It's probably coming down pretty fast!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You two! Make sure you meet up with us later! If you don't come back, I'm going to give you a bad time!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What are you talking about? Legkiy, legkiy.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Oh, Vivienne, you can take this.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: This is, the whistle from earlier?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Me and Yoshino will probably never use it again. At least until we leave these ruins.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What do you mean? You mean you won't call for help anymore?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Everyone, you're going to descend from here in one go! Hold tight, it's dangerous!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Come on, Vivienne, grab on!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's going down really fast! I don't think we're descending, more like we're falling!?
Leaving Yoshino and Yakutsk in a terminal overflowing with powered minecarts and a large number of Mist Monsters, the steel lift with seven of us on board fell into the darkness at great speed.
